Articles.Content: If you put them all in orbit more than 2.5km from each other it wont be a problem. If it's still an issue then I don't mind you bringing them in pairs cause I'm not going to want to shoot the one that's already spent ammo.
Can I join up ?
Sure but you'll have issues finding someone to fight.
Would You be willing to fight?
Sure why not.

I'd love to see a ship that doesn't use fuel.

Did shadow discover K-drive?
@Spartwo How does Vall sound? 5 ships max. Weight Limit 150 tons. no leaving SOI except to retreat. And I will defend. Also Can I just use Google Drive for the persist.
Sup guys the map is now updated if you are not on it and want to be PM on the forum How everyone doing?

Http://www./view/d6aa8d8jd4tv4ro/persistent.sfs.

It begins.

I'm interested in Joining. I will represent Decelia Corp, for lack of a company, or faction.

Any thing I have to do to join, like claiming planets, or just build a ship and put it in orbit?

I'm interested in Joining. I will represent Decelia Corp, for lack of a company, or faction.

Any thing I have to do to join, like claiming planets, or just build a ship and put it in orbit?

All that you have to do is just ask if anyone wants to battle you.

Http://www./view/d6aa8d8jd4tv4ro/persistent.sfs.

It begins.

Erm, the following rules kinda make things difficult for you (see p1):

-Weapons must be fired within 2.5km(Surface to orbit are an exception but only one may be fired per turn) -(you deployed 140km away with no propulsion on the ships themselves).

-A ship is considered dead when the original 'core' of the ship is incapable of sustaining power,Moving&Firing weapons unaided. -(they're already 'dead').

-Weapons can only be fired from the original ship core and must be used within the the same turn they are fired. -(this rule was added so that you can shoot at a ship carrying probes ('smart weapons') without just turning it into lots of little ships that can ram and also to prevent people from just bringing piles of missiles that need to be destroyed individually. Although; I do agree with you, it is the smart way to do it, it got banned cause it was ruining the thread).

Your ships can't move (you've brought unpowered probes attached to stacks of ammo) so you can't get in range and all I have to do disable the missiles is knock the original probe off.

Would you be willing to modify your designs or perhaps bring something else?
Couldn't I designate the probe at the top as the control probe then use the rearwards missiles to asparagus stage myself to victory?

Couldn't I designate the probe at the top as the control probe then use the rearwards missiles to asparagus stage myself to victory?

Apart from that totally not being what asparagus staging is, your ships are super fragile and you won't be victorious by doing that. You're fighting a veteran here. Your ships don't even have armour...

Alright, I have some reserve ships, I'll just deploy them instead.

Edited February 18, 2014 by Shadow Lane

-A ship is considered dead when the original 'core' of the ship is incapable of sustaining power,Moving&Firing weapons unaided. -(they're already 'dead').

I wasn't sure how to state it but power is always necessary,You can chose either moving or firing weapons or both. This is so stations and civillian vessels are still counted.
If I grabbed a ship with a giant claw and rammed it into The Mun, would that count as a movement or an attack action?

-Players are not allowed to intentionally edit the orbit of enemy craft.

Different rule applies there.
So... who would be up for a battle?

So... who would be up for a battle?

I'm up for a battle especially if it means to revive the thread.

Sorry it took so long to set up.

-panfish5 vs. daemonCaptrix-

Location: Moho (don't leave SOI)

Tonnage: 400t (mine go over by 3t, so don't feel guilty about weighing slightly over)

Ships: 5 total

daeCorp Fleet:

1 x Mathilda Tank

-Earl Grey Squad

2 x Nautilus-class Cruiser

-Neptune

-Calypso

2 x Dakuwaqa-class Battle Cruiser

-Dakuwaqa

-Dagon

First move goes to panfish5

Persistent: http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=43706853247160621045

Did my turn alot quicker than I expected because I was trying to develop some last minute weapons but I wanted to hurry up.

So I for my turn I took one of my fighters to engage the dagon

Shot fired

(P.S. you set the limit to 5 ships but you mentioned you had 6 and I found that you had a landed Nautilus Class Cruiser so thats a total of 7.) Is there a rule about landed ships that I am unaware of?

Sorry that limit of 5 lol. I mis-counted my ships. I'll delete one of the tanks. The cruiser is landed at start. It's not a seventh ship...
